explanation: The stage direction describes the details of the setting, specifying the appearance and essential elements of a room in the hideout of brigand klephtes. It focuses on the stage arrangement and necessary props such as a bed, a secretary, a display set, some seats, and an acoustic tube hanging on the wall.
stgdir: La plus belle chambre du repaire des brigands klephtes. - Luxe à volonté. Accessoires indispensables : un lit et un secrétaire quelconques. Une panoplie et quelques siéges. - Au mur pend un tube acoustique.
